For more information about 
the	flu	vaccine	talk	to	your	GP,

Whooping cough 
Whooping cough (pertussis) 
is an infection which can 
affect	people	of	all	ages	but	
is particularly serious for 
babies. Most babies who get 
it will have to be admitted to 
hospital, some will end up in 
intensive care and it can even 
result in death. Very young 
babies
